snippet: The New York Times Company was a victim of online attacks earlier this week that slowed down The New York Times Web site and limited access to content.
abstract: New York Times Company says it was victim of online attacks that slowed down company Web site and limited access to article and other content; company does not have confirmation on who is responsible for denial-of-service attacks.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times Company was a victim of online attacks earlier this week that slowed down The New York Times Web site and limited access to content.

headline.main: Times Site Is Attacked by Hackers
headline.print_headline: Times Site Is Attacked By Hackers
